title: About Alex - Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: As Secretary of State, he worked to make elections more accessible and inclusive while protecting the integrity of voting systems. Alex helped establish automatic and same-day voter registration, secured $500 million to upgrade California’s voting systems to meet higher security standards, and oversaw the implementation of the landmark Voter’s Choice Act, which expanded mail-in and in-person early voting.

title: Alex Padilla - Wikipedia
snippet: Alejandro "Alex" Padilla (born March 22, 1973) is an American politician serving as the senior United States senator from California, a seat he has held since 2021. A member of the Democratic Party, Padilla served as the 30th secretary of state of California from 2015 to 2021 and was a member ...

title: U.S. Senate: U.S. Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: As a State Senator, Alex passed more than 70 bills, including landmark legislation to combat climate change, and was named as one of Sacramento’s "most effective legislators." Alex was sworn in as California’s first Latino Secretary of State on January 5, 2015 and was re-elected in 2018, receiving the most votes of any Latino elected official in the United States.

title: About Alex Padilla - California Secretary of State BIOGRAPHY
snippet: Alex Padilla was sworn in as California Secretary of State on January 5, 2015.

title: Alex Padilla Resigns as California Secretary of State
snippet: SACRAMENTO, CA – Alex Padilla has resigned as California’s Secretary of State, in order to serve as California’s newest United States Senator. James Schwab has been sworn in as interim Secretary of State.
